Flow.description: NTF amount validation based on financial purpose v2

formulas.name: func_GetDPFromOpty
formulas.expression: IF(ISNULL({!Get_Curr_Opty.DP__c} ) == TRUE, "Rp 0", "Rp " & IF(LEN(TEXT(ROUND({!Get_Curr_Opty.DP__c} , 0))) > 12, TEXT(ROUND({!Get_Curr_Opty.DP__c} , 0)), IF(LEN(TEXT(ROUND({!Get_Curr_Opty.DP__c} , 0))) > 9, LEFT(TEXT(ROUND({!Get_Curr_Opty.DP__c} , 0)), LEN(TEXT(ROUND({!Get_Curr_Opty.DP__c} , 0))) - 9) & "." & MID(TEXT(ROUND({!Get_Curr_Opty.DP__c} , 0)), LEN(TEXT(ROUND({!Get_Curr_Opty.DP__c} , 0))) - 8, 3) & "." & MID(TEXT(ROUND({!Get_Curr_Opty.DP__c} , 0)), LEN(TEXT(ROUND({!Get_Curr_Opty.DP__c} , 0))) - 5, 3) & "." & RIGHT(TEXT(ROUND({!Get_Curr_Opty.DP__c} , 0)), 3), IF(LEN(TEXT(ROUND({!Get_Curr_Opty.DP__c} , 0))) > 6, LEFT(TEXT(ROUND({!Get_Curr_Opty.DP__c} , 0)), LEN(TEXT(ROUND({!Get_Curr_Opty.DP__c} , 0))) - 6) & "." & MID(TEXT(ROUND({!Get_Curr_Opty.DP__c} , 0)), LEN(TEXT(ROUND({!Get_Curr_Opty.DP__c} , 0))) - 5, 3) & "." & RIGHT(TEXT(ROUND({!Get_Curr_Opty.DP__c} , 0)), 3), IF(LEN(TEXT(ROUND({!Get_Curr_Opty.DP__c} , 0))) > 3, LEFT(TEXT(ROUND({!Get_Curr_Opty.DP__c} , 0)), LEN(TEXT(ROUND({!Get_Curr_Opty.DP__c} , 0))) - 3) & "." & RIGHT(TEXT(ROUND({!Get_Curr_Opty.DP__c} , 0)), 3), TEXT(ROUND({!Get_Curr_Opty.DP__c} , 0)) )))))

formulas.name: func_Loan_GetDP
formulas.expression: IF({!funcDP} == 0, "Rp 0", "Rp " & IF(LEN(TEXT(ROUND({!funcDP}, 0))) > 12, TEXT(ROUND({!funcDP}, 0)), IF(LEN(TEXT(ROUND({!funcDP}, 0))) > 9, LEFT(TEXT(ROUND({!funcDP}, 0)), LEN(TEXT(ROUND({!funcDP}, 0))) - 9) & "." & MID(TEXT(ROUND({!funcDP}, 0)), LEN(TEXT(ROUND({!funcDP}, 0))) - 8, 3) & "." & MID(TEXT(ROUND({!funcDP}, 0)), LEN(TEXT(ROUND({!funcDP}, 0))) - 5, 3) & "." & RIGHT(TEXT(ROUND({!funcDP}, 0)), 3), IF(LEN(TEXT(ROUND({!funcDP}, 0))) > 6, LEFT(TEXT(ROUND({!funcDP}, 0)), LEN(TEXT(ROUND({!funcDP}, 0))) - 6) & "." & MID(TEXT(ROUND({!funcDP}, 0)), LEN(TEXT(ROUND({!funcDP}, 0))) - 5, 3) & "." & RIGHT(TEXT(ROUND({!funcDP}, 0)), 3), IF(LEN(TEXT(ROUND({!funcDP}, 0))) > 3, LEFT(TEXT(ROUND({!funcDP}, 0)), LEN(TEXT(ROUND({!funcDP}, 0))) - 3) & "." & RIGHT(TEXT(ROUND({!funcDP}, 0)), 3), TEXT(ROUND({!funcDP}, 0)) )))))

formulas.name: func_Loan_GetFundingAmount
formulas.expression: IF(ISNULL({!Calc.ntf_amount__c}) == TRUE, "", "Rp " & IF(LEN(TEXT(ROUND({!Calc.ntf_amount__c}, 0))) > 12, TEXT(ROUND({!Calc.ntf_amount__c}, 0)), IF(LEN(TEXT(ROUND({!Calc.ntf_amount__c}, 0))) > 9, LEFT(TEXT(ROUND({!Calc.ntf_amount__c}, 0)), LEN(TEXT(ROUND({!Calc.ntf_amount__c}, 0))) - 9) & "." & MID(TEXT(ROUND({!Calc.ntf_amount__c}, 0)), LEN(TEXT(ROUND({!Calc.ntf_amount__c}, 0))) - 8, 3) & "." & MID(TEXT(ROUND({!Calc.ntf_amount__c}, 0)), LEN(TEXT(ROUND({!Calc.ntf_amount__c}, 0))) - 5, 3) & "." & RIGHT(TEXT(ROUND({!Calc.ntf_amount__c}, 0)), 3), IF(LEN(TEXT(ROUND({!Calc.ntf_amount__c}, 0))) > 6, LEFT(TEXT(ROUND({!Calc.ntf_amount__c}, 0)), LEN(TEXT(ROUND({!Calc.ntf_amount__c}, 0))) - 6) & "." & MID(TEXT(ROUND({!Calc.ntf_amount__c}, 0)), LEN(TEXT(ROUND({!Calc.ntf_amount__c}, 0))) - 5, 3) & "." & RIGHT(TEXT(ROUND({!Calc.ntf_amount__c}, 0)), 3), IF(LEN(TEXT(ROUND({!Calc.ntf_amount__c}, 0))) > 3, LEFT(TEXT(ROUND({!Calc.ntf_amount__c}, 0)), LEN(TEXT(ROUND({!Calc.ntf_amount__c}, 0))) - 3) & "." & RIGHT(TEXT(ROUND({!Calc.ntf_amount__c}, 0)), 3), TEXT(ROUND({!Calc.ntf_amount__c}, 0)) )))))

formulas.name: func_Loan_GetProvisionFeeAmount
formulas.expression: IF(ISBLANK({!Calc.provision_fee__c}), "", "Rp. " & IF(LEN(TEXT(ROUND({!Calc.provision_fee__c}, 0))) > 12, LEFT(TEXT(ROUND({!Calc.provision_fee__c}, 0)), LEN(TEXT(ROUND({!Calc.provision_fee__c}, 0))) - 12) & "." & MID(TEXT(ROUND({!Calc.provision_fee__c}, 0)), LEN(TEXT(ROUND({!Calc.provision_fee__c}, 0))) - 11, 3) & "." & MID(TEXT(ROUND({!Calc.provision_fee__c}, 0)), LEN(TEXT(ROUND({!Calc.provision_fee__c}, 0))) - 8, 3) & "." & MID(TEXT(ROUND({!Calc.provision_fee__c}, 0)), LEN(TEXT(ROUND({!Calc.provision_fee__c}, 0))) - 5, 3) & "." & RIGHT(TEXT(ROUND({!Calc.provision_fee__c}, 0)), 3), IF(LEN(TEXT(ROUND({!Calc.provision_fee__c}, 0))) > 9, LEFT(TEXT(ROUND({!Calc.provision_fee__c}, 0)), LEN(TEXT(ROUND({!Calc.provision_fee__c}, 0))) - 9) & "." & MID(TEXT(ROUND({!Calc.provision_fee__c}, 0)), LEN(TEXT(ROUND({!Calc.provision_fee__c}, 0))) - 8, 3) & "." & MID(TEXT(ROUND({!Calc.provision_fee__c}, 0)), LEN(TEXT(ROUND({!Calc.provision_fee__c}, 0))) - 5, 3) & "." & RIGHT(TEXT(ROUND({!Calc.provision_fee__c}, 0)), 3), IF(LEN(TEXT(ROUND({!Calc.provision_fee__c}, 0))) > 6, LEFT(TEXT(ROUND({!Calc.provision_fee__c}, 0)), LEN(TEXT(ROUND({!Calc.provision_fee__c}, 0))) - 6) & "." & MID(TEXT(ROUND({!Calc.provision_fee__c}, 0)), LEN(TEXT(ROUND({!Calc.provision_fee__c}, 0))) - 5, 3) & "." & RIGHT(TEXT(ROUND({!Calc.provision_fee__c}, 0)), 3), IF(LEN(TEXT(ROUND({!Calc.provision_fee__c}, 0))) > 3, LEFT(TEXT(ROUND({!Calc.provision_fee__c}, 0)), LEN(TEXT(ROUND({!Calc.provision_fee__c}, 0))) - 3) & "." & RIGHT(TEXT(ROUND({!Calc.provision_fee__c}, 0)), 3), TEXT(ROUND({!Calc.provision_fee__c}, 0)) )))))

formulas.name: FuncMaxBillingInterestPRK
formulas.expression: IF(ISNULL({!Calc.PRK_Interest__c}) == TRUE, "Rp 0", "Rp " & IF(LEN(TEXT(ROUND({!Calc.PRK_Interest__c}, 0))) > 12, TEXT(ROUND({!Calc.PRK_Interest__c}, 0)), IF(LEN(TEXT(ROUND({!Calc.PRK_Interest__c}, 0))) > 9, LEFT(TEXT(ROUND({!Calc.PRK_Interest__c}, 0)), LEN(TEXT(ROUND({!Calc.PRK_Interest__c}, 0))) - 9) & "." & MID(TEXT(ROUND({!Calc.PRK_Interest__c}, 0)), LEN(TEXT(ROUND({!Calc.PRK_Interest__c}, 0))) - 8, 3) & "." & MID(TEXT(ROUND({!Calc.PRK_Interest__c}, 0)), LEN(TEXT(ROUND({!Calc.PRK_Interest__c}, 0))) - 5, 3) & "." & RIGHT(TEXT(ROUND({!Calc.PRK_Interest__c}, 0)), 3), IF(LEN(TEXT(ROUND({!Calc.PRK_Interest__c}, 0))) > 6, LEFT(TEXT(ROUND({!Calc.PRK_Interest__c}, 0)), LEN(TEXT(ROUND({!Calc.PRK_Interest__c}, 0))) - 6) & "." & MID(TEXT(ROUND({!Calc.PRK_Interest__c}, 0)), LEN(TEXT(ROUND({!Calc.PRK_Interest__c}, 0))) - 5, 3) & "." & RIGHT(TEXT(ROUND({!Calc.PRK_Interest__c}, 0)), 3), IF(LEN(TEXT(ROUND({!Calc.PRK_Interest__c}, 0))) > 3, LEFT(TEXT(ROUND({!Calc.PRK_Interest__c}, 0)), LEN(TEXT(ROUND({!Calc.PRK_Interest__c}, 0))) - 3) & "." & RIGHT(TEXT(ROUND({!Calc.PRK_Interest__c}, 0)), 3), TEXT(ROUND({!Calc.PRK_Interest__c}, 0)) )))))

formulas.name: funcS_DefaultInstallmentScheme
formulas.expression: IF({!Calc.installment_scheme__c} == "RF", "Regular Fixed" , IF({!Calc.installment_scheme__c} == "IR", "Irregular", IF({!Calc.installment_scheme__c} == "ST", "Step Up Step Down", IF({!Calc.installment_scheme__c} == "EP", "Even Principal", IF({!Calc.installment_scheme__c} == "FI", "Flexible Installment Plan", "")))))

formulas.name: funcViewPencairanMinimal
formulas.expression: IF(ISNULL({!funcPencairanMinimal}) == TRUE, "", "Rp " & IF(LEN(TEXT(ROUND({!funcPencairanMinimal}, 0))) > 12, TEXT(ROUND({!funcPencairanMinimal}, 0)), IF(LEN(TEXT(ROUND({!funcPencairanMinimal}, 0))) > 9, LEFT(TEXT(ROUND({!funcPencairanMinimal}, 0)), LEN(TEXT(ROUND({!funcPencairanMinimal}, 0))) - 9) & "." & MID(TEXT(ROUND({!funcPencairanMinimal}, 0)), LEN(TEXT(ROUND({!funcPencairanMinimal}, 0))) - 8, 3) & "." & MID(TEXT(ROUND({!funcPencairanMinimal}, 0)), LEN(TEXT(ROUND({!funcPencairanMinimal}, 0))) - 5, 3) & "." & RIGHT(TEXT(ROUND({!funcPencairanMinimal}, 0)), 3), IF(LEN(TEXT(ROUND({!funcPencairanMinimal}, 0))) > 6, LEFT(TEXT(ROUND({!funcPencairanMinimal}, 0)), LEN(TEXT(ROUND({!funcPencairanMinimal}, 0))) - 6) & "." & MID(TEXT(ROUND({!funcPencairanMinimal}, 0)), LEN(TEXT(ROUND({!funcPencairanMinimal}, 0))) - 5, 3) & "." & RIGHT(TEXT(ROUND({!funcPencairanMinimal}, 0)), 3), IF(LEN(TEXT(ROUND({!funcPencairanMinimal}, 0))) > 3, LEFT(TEXT(ROUND({!funcPencairanMinimal}, 0)), LEN(TEXT(ROUND({!funcPencairanMinimal}, 0))) - 3) & "." & RIGHT(TEXT(ROUND({!funcPencairanMinimal}, 0)), 3), TEXT(ROUND({!funcPencairanMinimal}, 0)) )))))

fields.name: lblKonfirmasi
fields.fieldText:
Perubahan yang Anda lakukan termasuk kategori STRUKTURAL dan akan menyebabkan reset Proses Pengajuan.

Lanjutkan?

fields.name: disp_tpl_MaxProvisionRatePOTNotFound
fields.fieldText: Query Provision Rate For Not Found POT : {!tpl_MaxProvisionRatePOTNotFound}

fields.name: disp_detect_changes
fields.fieldText:
AnyChanges : {!func_AnyChangesInNTFTenorPackage}


Package : Stored = {!Get_Curr_Survey.Product_Offering__c} vs Current = {!df_PackageID.firstRetrievedRecord.text_package_id__c}


Tenor : Stored = {!Get_Curr_Survey.Tenor__c} vs Current = {!editor_Tenor}


NTF : Stored = {!Get_Survey.NTF_Pengajuan__c} vs Current = {!editor_NTFPengajuan}

fields.name: display_debug2
fields.fieldText:
Selected Product Offering (DEBUG) :

1: {!editor_ProductOffering} / {!editor_ProductType}


2: {!editor_ProductOffering2} / {!editor_ProductType}


3: {!SelectedProductOffering} /

{!editor_ProductType}

validationRule.errorMessage: NTF melebihi max exposure, tujuan : {!Get_Curr_Survey.Tujuan_Pembiayaan__c}, customer : {!func_CustomerTypeText}, package : {!df_PackageID.firstRetrievedRecord.text_package_id__c}
Bank account number must not be empty and contains 8 - 25 digits only

textTemplates.name: tpl_AdminFee
textTemplates.text: SELECT admin_fee__c from Master_Admin_Fee__c where product_id__c = '3' AND package_id__c = '{!df_PackageID.firstRetrievedRecord.text_package_id__c}' AND customer_type__c = '{!func_Current_CustomerType}' AND ntf_max__c>= {!func_ValueNTF} and ntf_min__c<= {!func_ValueNTF} ORDER BY admin_fee__c DESC LIMIT 1

textTemplates.name: tpl_EffectiveRate
textTemplates.text: SELECT rate__c FROM Master_Package_Rate__c WHERE product_id__c = '3' AND package_id__c = '{!df_PackageID.firstRetrievedRecord.text_package_id__c}' AND ntf_max__c >= {!func_ValueNTF} AND ntf_min__c <= {!func_ValueNTF} AND max_tenure__c >= {!func_SelectMaxTenor} AND min_tenure__c <= {!func_SelectMaxTenor} ORDER BY rate__c DESC LIMIT 1

textTemplates.name: tpl_MaxExposureByPOF
textTemplates.text: SELECT Customer_Type__c, Finance_Purpose__c, Max_Exposure__c, Min_Exposure__c, Name, Package_Id__c, Package_Name__c, Product_Id__c, Purpose_of_Financing__c, Way_of_Financing__c FROM Package_Details__c WHERE Finance_Purpose__c = '{!func_TujuanPembiayaanCode}' AND Package_Id__c = '{!df_PackageID.firstRetrievedRecord.text_package_id__c}' AND Product_Id__c = '3' AND Customer_Type__c = '{!func_Current_CustomerType}'

textTemplates.name: tpl_MaxProvisionRatePOTNotFound
textTemplates.text: SELECT rate__c FROM Master_Provision_Fee__c WHERE product_id__c = '3' AND package_id__c = '{!df_PackageID.firstRetrievedRecord.text_package_id__c}' ORDER BY rate__c DESC LIMIT 1

textTemplates.name: tpl_MaxTenure
textTemplates.text: SELECT max_tenure__c from Master_Package_Rate__c WHERE product_id__c = '3' AND package_id__c = '{!df_PackageID.firstRetrievedRecord.text_package_id__c}' AND ntf_max__c >= {!func_ValueNTF} AND ntf_min__c <= {!func_ValueNTF} ORDER BY max_tenure__c DESC LIMIT 1

textTemplates.name: tpl_PackageID
textTemplates.text: SELECT text_package_id__c from Product_Offering__c where Name = '{!func_GetSelectedProductOffering}'

textTemplates.name: tpl_ProvisionRate
textTemplates.text: SELECT rate__c FROM Master_Provision_Fee__c WHERE product_id__c = '3' AND package_id__c = '{!df_PackageID.firstRetrievedRecord.text_package_id__c}' AND tenor_max__c >= {!func_SelectMaxTenor} AND tenor_min__c <= {!func_SelectMaxTenor} ORDER BY rate__c DESC LIMIT 1

textTemplates.name: tplProductOffering
textTemplates.text: Select Id, Name, text_package_id__c from Product_Offering__c where Product_Type__c = '{!editor_ProductType}'
